import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { MapPin, TrendingUp, Star, Users, Target, Zap, Shield, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; const WhatWeOffer = () => { return (
{/* Section Header */}

How We Help Local Businesses Dominate Google Maps

We're not your typical SEO agency. We focus on one thing: getting your business to the top of Google Maps so you get more calls, more customers, and more revenue.

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Introduction */}

The Problem: You're Invisible to Local Customers

When someone searches for your service in your area, they see the Google Map Pack first. If you're not in the top 3, you're basically invisible. Your competitors are getting all the calls while you're left wondering why your phone isn't ringing.

That's where we come in. We've helped hundreds of local businesses go from invisible to dominating their local market. Here's exactly how we do it.

{/* Core Strategy */}

Our 3-Pillar Strategy for Google Maps Domination

{/* Pillar 1 */}

Pillar 1: Optimize Your Google Business Profile

Think of your Google Business Profile as your digital storefront. Most businesses have incomplete or poorly optimized profiles that Google ignores. We fix everything: photos, descriptions, categories, hours, services, and more.

What this means for you: When someone searches for your service, Google immediately recognizes your business as relevant and authoritative. This alone can move you from page 3 to page 1.

{/* Pillar 2 */}

Pillar 2: Build Local Authority Through Citations

Google needs to see your business mentioned consistently across the web. We build citations (mentions of your business name, address, and phone) on high-authority websites that Google trusts.

What this means for you: Google sees your business as established and trustworthy. We're not talking about spammy directories - we use real, authoritative websites that actually matter to Google.

{/* Pillar 3 */}

Pillar 3: Generate Reviews and Social Proof

Reviews are like word-of-mouth marketing on steroids. Google loves businesses with lots of positive reviews, and customers trust businesses with high ratings. We help you get more reviews and manage your online reputation.

What this means for you: More reviews = higher rankings + more customer trust. It's that simple. We help you get 3-5 new reviews per month, all authentic and from real customers.

{/* Advanced Techniques */}

Advanced Techniques That Give You the Edge

Map Embed Stacking

We strategically place Google Maps embeds on high-authority websites. This tells Google that your business is important enough to be featured on trusted sites, boosting your local ranking signals.

Schema Markup

We add special code to your website that helps Google understand exactly what your business does, where you're located, and what services you offer. This makes you more likely to appear in local searches.

Google Posts

Regular Google Posts keep your business active and engaging. We create and schedule posts that highlight your services, promotions, and updates, keeping you top-of-mind with potential customers.

Competitor Analysis

We analyze what your top competitors are doing right and identify gaps in their strategy. This helps us position you to outrank them and capture their customers.

{/* Results Section */}

What This Means for Your Business

Top 3 Rankings

Most clients reach the top 3 in Google Maps within 30-60 days

More Customers

Average 150-300% increase in phone calls and leads

Real Revenue

Clients typically see $30K-$100K+ in additional monthly revenue

{/* Why Us */}

Why Local Businesses Choose Rankly360

We're Local SEO Specialists

Unlike general SEO agencies, we focus 100% on local search. We understand the nuances of Google Maps ranking better than anyone. This specialization means faster, more reliable results.

Proven Track Record

We've helped 500+ local businesses achieve top rankings. Our clients include plumbers, dentists, lawyers, contractors, and service professionals across all industries.

White-Hat Methods Only

We use only Google-approved techniques that build sustainable rankings. No black-hat tricks that could get you penalized. Your success is our reputation.

Fast, Measurable Results

Most clients see improvements within 30-60 days. We provide detailed monthly reports so you can see exactly how your rankings and traffic are improving.

{/* CTA */}

Ready to Dominate Your Local Market?

Stop losing customers to your competitors. Let's get your business to the top of Google Maps where it belongs.

); }; export default WhatWeOffer;
